      • generateComplexScoreMap

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> generateComplexScoreMap(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double>> recommendationMap)
        generate a complex recommendation map by ratio in the recommendation map. it computes the avg of recommendation score and general rate The idea is to integrate the rates given by user and the recommendation score given by our model.
        Specified by:
        generateComplexScoreMap in interface UseRecommendationUpdate
        Parameters:
        recommendationMap - recommendation map, containing each instructor's name as key, another map of recommendation score, general rate and difficulty rate as value.
        Returns:
        complex recommendation map of instName to score.

      • modelInference

        public double modelInference(java.lang.String reviewString)
                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Run the model inference on the review string and get the recommendation score.
        Specified by:
        modelInference in interface UseInferenceScore
        Parameters:
        reviewString - user review string
        Returns:
        text recommendation score in double format
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - exception
